## gridProColumns() function

A directive that renders a set of grid-pro-column elements from a given input binding

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function gridProColumns<TSource = any>(itemsBinding: Binding<TSource, readonly ColDef[]> | readonly ColDef[], includeRenderers?: boolean): CaptureType<TSource>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  itemsBinding | Binding&lt;TSource, readonly ColDef\[\]&gt; \| readonly ColDef\[\] | The array to render |
|  includeRenderers | boolean | _(Optional)_ Optionally tells whether to include cell renderers, if available |

**Returns:**

CaptureType&lt;TSource&gt;
